text: American Favorite Ballads, Vol. 2 is a studio album by American folk singer Pete Seeger. It was released in 1958 by Folkways Records. It was later reissued in 2003 by Smithsonian Folkways. ==Track listing== ==References== Category:1958 albums Category:Pete Seeger albums Category:Folkways Records albums
title: American Favorite Ballads, Vol. 2
